name: Mostash
tag_list: socialmedia, newmedia, twitter, facebook, strategy, content, outsourcing
overview:
Mostash is a small social media studio offering Twitter, Facebook and blogging strategy + content.

We’re compiling an exclusive social media marketing strategy for every client, and updating the tactics monthly, based on specific needs, goals, competition moves and market changes. Having a blog is absolutely necessary these days, but writing quality content is not enough. We find out where’s the audience for your niche and promote your every post.

Curating content for a social audience is another thing we’re very good at. Our team is trained to publish relevant information and earn ultra-targeted followers every day. Find out what does the social consumer think about your brand and about your competition. Get monthly and weekly reports from our online reputation monitoring experts.
